Magic Notes:

Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Bloodline Shadow: Casting darkness or shadow spell gives +1/spell level to Stealth for 1d4 rd
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Ectoplasmic Spell: May spend +1 spell slot to target an incorporeal or ethereal creature
Elemental Spell (Acid): May use +1 spell slot to convert half or all spell damage to acid damage
Enveloping Darkness: May use entangling Deeper Darkness effects 1/dy
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Shadow Master (Sorcerer): Summoned shadow creatures gain +4 Strength, +4 Constitution, and 20% more reality
Shadow Well: R60' May use Dimension Door effects in darkness or dim light to swap places w/an ally or swap 2 allies 3/dy
Thundering Spell: May spend +2 spell slot to deafen target (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd
